questionTitle: Which of the following sells a server referred to as Cloud Attached Storage?
questionExplanation: Cloud Attached Storage is meant for the Small and Medium Business.

questionOption1: The CTERA Cloud Attached Storage backup server has the attributes of a NAS
questionOption2: CDMI removes older information that is no longer operational and saves it for long-term storage
questionOption3: OCMI cloud backup provides a solution that optimizes the backup based on bandwidth availability
questionExplanation: Backed up data may be shared between users.

questionTitle: The development of systems on a chip has enabled CTERA to create a scaled-down version of the CTERA server called the CTERA __________
questionExplanation: This palm-sized low-power device converts a USB/eSATA drive and your Ethernet network and turns the hard drive into a NAS server.

questionTitle: Which of the following filesystem can be backed up by CloudPlug?
questionExplanation: Laptops may be backed up from any location because they are assigned a roaming profile with dynamic IP support.

questionOption1: Clients have browser-based access to the backups or can locally access files using CTERA “Virtual Cloud Drive” network drive
questionOption2: CloudPlug performs backup and synchronization services and then performs automated or on-demand backups and snapshots of your systems
questionOption3: CloudPlug uses UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) and Bonjour to discover systems on the network
questionExplanation: The software works with Microsoft Active Directory and allows for role-based user access.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the open cloud storage management standard by SNIA?
questionExplanation: CDMI stands for Cloud Data Management Interface.

questionTitle: Which of the following standard uses the same authorization and authentication mechanism as CDMI?
questionExplanation: CDMI includes commands that allow applications to access cloud storage and create, retrieve, update, and delete data objects.

questionTitle: While working with the storage domain model, CDMI allows for interoperation of which of the following clouds?
questionExplanation: The CDMI data object can manage CDMI containers, as well as containers that are accessible in cloud storage through other supported protocols.

questionTitle: In the Cloud Data Management Interface (CDMI), the storage space is partitioned into units called _________
questionExplanation: A container stores a set of data in it and serves as the named object upon which data service operations are performed.

questionTitle: Which of the following server performs the backups of clients without requiring any client-based software?
questionExplanation: CTERA cloud backup performs incremental backups from the server, compressing and encrypting the data that is transmitted to CTERA cloud storage servers where deduplication is performed.
